branchCategory.name: LESH, Electric Actuator, Slide Table Type
branchCategory.description: The LESH electric actuator combines a motor and ball screw drive, worktable, and linear guide in compact body. The machined table is more rigid than the LES formed table, enabling higher horizontal loads and improved deflection from offset loading. Body orientations include basic, symmetrical, and inline mounted motor.

breadCrumb.name: LESH, Electric Actuator, Slide Table Type
